HEROES 2

    • {{hero.name}} , {{hero.height}}, {{hero.origin}}
      • {{skill}}
import { Component, OnDestroy, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {Hero} from '../app/Models/hero' import { Observable, Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { Store } from '@ngrx/store'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { constructor( private store: Store<{heroList:{heroes: Hero[]}}> ) {console.log("app comp init")} heroes: Observable<{heroes: Hero[]}>; xero: { heroes: Hero[]}; yero: Hero[] = []; sub: Subscription; ngOnInit(): void { this.heroes = this.store.select('heroList') this.sub = this.heroes.subscribe( { next: (hero) => {console.log("incoming"),console.log(hero), this.xero = hero, this.yero = hero.heroes}, error: err => console.log(err), complete: () => console.log("complete") } ) } getHeroes(): Hero[] { console.log(this.xero.heroes) console.log("----") console.log(this.yero) console.log("----") console.log(this.heroes) return this.xero.heroes } ngOnDestroy(): void { console.log("destroyed app component") } }
